column2: Antipeter has recently died, but to the surprise the realm, he forsook his son, Cassander has the new regent in favor of long time friend, Polyperchon. An upset Cassander denounces the new regent as a usurper. He has sent a call to arms to every corner of the empire demanding the satraps acknowledge him as regent and oust Polyperchon. As sides are set, the 2nd War has begun.
Cassander was heir and should be Regent.
Let us wait and see how it unfolds.
